Package org.bukkit.block

Classes used to manipulate the voxels in a world, including special states.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Beacon
    Represents a beacon.
    Block
    Represents a block.
    BlockState
    Represents a captured state of a block, which will not change automatically.
    BrewingStand
    Represents a brewing stand.
    Chest
    Represents a chest.
    CommandBlock  
    ContainerBlock Deprecated
    in favour of InventoryHolder
    CreatureSpawner
    Represents a creature spawner.
    Dispenser
    Represents a dispenser.
    Dropper
    Represents a dropper.
    Furnace
    Represents a furnace.
    Hopper
    Represents a hopper.
    Jukebox
    Represents a Jukebox
    NoteBlock
    Represents a note.
    Sign
    Represents either a SignPost or a WallSign
    Skull
    Represents a Skull
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoubleChest
    Represents a double chest.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Biome
    Holds all accepted Biomes in the default server
    BlockFace
    Represents the face of a block
    PistonMoveReaction  

Package org.bukkit.block Description

Classes used to manipulate the voxels in a world, including special states.
